Name: Step Journey
About the game: A turn-based RPG journey with many unique items and abilities to create your own unique character. Locations are created using procedural generation with unique monsters, unusual loot of varying quality, quests and bosses. PROCEDURAL MAP GENERATION Each map is unique and consists of different pieces united by design and location features. MONSTERS, Beasts, UNDEAD, ETC. Each type of location has its own unique monsters. Each of them has its own unusual characteristics and attack style. From slow and strong zombies, skeleton archers, to demons and magical elementals. WEAPONS AND MAGIC FOR EVERY TASTE Swords; Luke; Axes; Crossbows; Magic Staves; Armor Sets. You will be able to assemble your UNIQUE warrior with unusual characteristics and abilities. TRADE In the cities there are merchants with a unique and constantly updated range of goods.
